nodes.documentation:
@dev Stakes a specified amount of OMG tokens.
@param _amount The amount of OMG tokens to stake.
nodes.name: stakeTokens

nodes.documentation: @dev Unstakes all staked OMG tokens and withdraws them to the sender's address.
nodes.name: unstakeTokens

nodes.documentation:
@dev Issues OMNIK tokens to all stakers proportional to their staked amount of OMG tokens.
Only the owner can call this function.
nodes.name: issueTokens

attributes.documentation:
@dev Stakes a specified amount of OMG tokens.
@param _amount The amount of OMG tokens to stake.
attributes.name: stakeTokens

attributes.documentation: @dev Unstakes all staked OMG tokens and withdraws them to the sender's address.
attributes.name: unstakeTokens

attributes.documentation:
@dev Issues OMNIK tokens to all stakers proportional to their staked amount of OMG tokens.
Only the owner can call this function.
attributes.name: issueTokens

constructor.details: Constructor that sets the addresses of the OMNIK and OMG tokens and the owner of the contract.

params._omgToken: Address of the OMG token contract.
params._omnikToken: Address of the OMNIK token contract.

issueTokens().details: Issues OMNIK tokens to all stakers proportional to their staked amount of OMG tokens. Only the owner can call this function.

stakeTokens(uint256).details: Stakes a specified amount of OMG tokens.

params._amount: The amount of OMG tokens to stake.

unstakeTokens().details: Unstakes all staked OMG tokens and withdraws them to the sender's address.
